name: PewPew (itch) (Scott Topping)
description:
Stay alive as long as possible while also collecting all the objectives

Batteries can be picked up to recharge you.

  • Controls 
  • Move mouse to aim
  • left click to shoot
  • Shift - activate bullet time
  • Space - Fast move

Game can be played in browser but it's a lot more pretty if you download it :)

Made for SideQuest game jam #4 to the theme of 1 room. To be honest I struggled for ideas for this theme but  I went with one big maze ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

I learned alot when making this game... Mostly about using raycasts and making AI enemies.
